mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYPAGE (MYPAGENO, MEMBERNO, MYPAGEDEL, MYPAGECONTENT, MYPAGETITLE) VALUES (MYPAGE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, 0, 1, #{mypageContent}, #{mypageTitle} )
mapper.select: SELECT MYPAGENO, MEMBERNO, MYPAGEDEL, MYPAGECONTENT, MYPAGEDATE,MYPAGETITLE FROM MYPAGE ORDER BY MYPAGENO DESC
SELECT NICKNAME, USERTYPE, ID, NAME, BREEDS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBERNO = 0

SELECT ANT.ANISAVENAME, A.ANINO, A.ANINAME, A.ANIBIRTH, A.SITE, A.ANIINFO, A.ANIBREED, A.ANIGENDER, D.DOAMOUNT FROM ANI A, DONATION D, ANIATTACH ANT, WHERE A.ANINO = D.ANINO AND A.ANINO = ANT.ANINO AND D.ANINO = ANT.ANINO AND MEMBERNO = 0
SELECT DISTINCT A.ANINAME FROM ANI A, INTERESTANI ITN WHERE A.ANINO = ITN.ANINO AND A.MEMBERNO = ITN.MEMBERNO
